sqlMessage: In aggregated query without GROUP BY, expression #1 of SELECT list contains nonaggregated column 'ds_public.ds_module.did'; this is incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by
sql:
select ds_module.did as ds_module_did,ds_module.ds_key as ds_module_ds_key,ds_module.ds_name as ds_module_ds_name,ds_module.ds_type as ds_module_ds_type,ds_module.ds_dec as ds_module_ds_dec,ds_module.ds_update_time as ds_module_ds_update_time,ds_module.ds_create_time as ds_module_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module_table.did) as ds_module_table_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module_table.ds_left_did) as ds_module_table_ds_left_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module_table.ds_right_did) as ds_module_table_ds_right_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module_table.ds_update_time) as ds_module_table_ds_update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module_table.ds_create_time) as ds_module_table_ds_create_time
                                    from ds_module
                                    left join ds_module_table on ds_module_table.ds_left_did=ds_module.did  left join ds_table on ds_table.did=ds_module_table.ds_right_did
